mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL INTO FL_PJT_CODE VALUES (#{pjtC},#{pjtDivC},#{pjtStC},#{pjtOrgC}) INTO FL_PROJECT VALUES (#{pjtC},#{pjtClient},#{pjtNm}, #{pjtEmpList},#{pjtPm},#{pjtStartDate}, #{pjtEndDate},#{pjtEndYn},#{pjtStC})
SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT PJT_C as pjtC, PJT_ORG_C as pjtOrgC, PJT_DIV_C as pjtDivC, PJT_ST_C as pjtStC, PJT_CLIENT as pjtClient, PJT_NM as pjtNm, PJT_EMP_LIST as pjtEmpList, PJT_PM as pjtPm, PJT_START_DATE as pjtStartDate, PJT_End_DATE as pjtEndDate, PJT_END_YN as pjtEndYn FROM FL_PROJECT
